heroSection.heroP: We welcome you to the official website of the leading company in the field of engineering and construction. With the latest advanced capabilities, we will implement a project for you beyond imagination.

VT.h1: The Exclusive Agent of V&T in Egypt
The Exclusive Agent of V&T in Egypt

text.subTitle: Build your dream project
text.title: 10 years of success and achievements
text.statsP: We have achieved many successes and achievements in engineering projects in the shortest period and with the best evaluation.

cardPs.0: We work at a high level of quality to suit the client's requirements.
cardPs.1: We are the best in the market to offer competitive prices by understanding customer budget & their expectations, without compromising the quality standard.
cardPs.2: A Special team of professional engineers and technicians Highly experienced with full support with the latest tools and equipments.
cardPs.3: We ensure that projects are delivered within the specified timeframe for customers. We're ready to work 24/7 even in the narrowest timeframe. We have shown this in our previous projects.
cardPs.4: The company is committed to comprehensively guaranteeing all its services and missions with a quick response to customer requests.

CardHeadings.5: Plumbing works, pumps, and air compressors

CardP.0: From cooling units with ice water, pumps, cooling towers, Freon units for direct cooling, and heating units
CardP.1: Control panels using (PLC-HMI-SCADA), main and subsidiary low-voltage distribution panels - panels regulating the operation of electric motors - classic control panels of all kinds.
CardP.2: We work to modernize and maintain machines and production lines for all types of factories using PLC panels and touch screens for all industries.
CardP.3: Supply of spare parts and various operating supplies. We supply all components of automatic control panels and distribution panels
CardP.4: Surveillance systems - internal exchanges - fire alarm systems - attendance and departure systems - paging and audio systems
CardP.5: We work to modernize and maintain machines and production lines for all types of factories using PLC panels and touch screens for all industries.

Headings.11: Design, implementation, and supply of all light-current systems

0.0: Chilled water cooling units, pumps, and cooling towers.
Air handling units, all types of fans, ductwork, piping, and associated insulation, cladding, and welding works.

1.0: Fire alarm and automatic extinguishing systems.
Pump room equipment, including water tanks.
Installation of pumps (electric, diesel, jockey pumps), piping network, valves, sprinklers, and fire hydrants.
Sandblasting, painting, and welding works as required.

3.0: Air compressor systems, including compressors, dryers, tanks, supply, installation, maintenance, and spare parts.

4.0: High-quality welding of all pipe joints.

6.0: Metal structures, overhead cranes, and tanks.
Blacksmithing, machining, welding, sandblasting, and painting services for all sections and shapes according to designs and customer requirements.

7.0: Classic control panels of all types.
Power factor correction panels and maintenance.
Control panels for machines (lathes, milling machines, CNC machines) and maintenance.

8.0: Maintenance and modernization of machinery and production lines for all types of factories, and preparation for automatic operation using the latest technologies: PLC-HMI-SCADA.
Periodic maintenance contracts for all production lines anywhere in Egypt.
Development of preventive maintenance programs and monitoring the implementation of comprehensive TPM maintenance programs.

9.0: Supply of all components for control panels and distribution panels.
Supply of spare parts and various operating supplies.
Providing solutions and alternatives to ensure the continuity of the production process.
The company is committed to providing full technical support to its customers.
The company is committed to guaranteeing all services and tasks it provides.

10.0: Providing technical and financial offers for the establishment and development of companies.
Studying electrical loads and providing optimal wiring diagrams.

Vision.Heading: Providing high-quality technical services that meet the ambitions of our customers and raise the production process to its maximum levels
Vision.VisionP: We always strive to satisfy our customers by combining speed of implementation, achieving quality performance, and providing services at competitive prices

Steps.Heading: We use the best modern methods
Steps.StepsP: We aim to continuously develop our technical team to be fully prepared to meet all labor market requirements.

Text.1: I seriously recommend this company. They carried out their work with the utmost precision and in the fastest time. It is truly the best company in the field.
Text.2: I did not imagine that I would find a company that uses the latest technologies in this field and completes its work really quickly. I am happy to deal with you.
Text.3: I contacted this company and I was worried at first, but I didn't really expect that I would see such excellent results. Thank you very much.
Text.4: I seriously recommend this company. They carried out their work with the utmost precision and in the fastest time. It is truly the best company in the field.
